Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.view.GUI.FXGUI

Class InGameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.view.GUI.FXGUI.GeneralController
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.view.GUI.FXGUI.InGameController
public class InGameController extends GeneralController
This class is the controller of the main Game scene from where the players play the game

    • startingSetup

      public void startingSetup(ArrayList<String> nicknames, List<Integer> resource, List<Integer> golden, List<Integer> aim)
      This method is called when the Game is starting in order to load the first graphical components
      Parameters:
      nicknames - is a reference to an ArrayList containing the name of the players
      resource - is a reference to a List containing the IDs of CommonBoard ResourceCards
      golden - is a reference to a List containing the IDs of CommonBoard GoldenResourceCards
      aim - is a reference to a List containing the IDs of CommonBoard AimCards

      This method is called when a player selects the face on which he wants to play the StartingCard previously displayed on screen and sends the result to the server
      Parameters:
      e - is the mouseClick on the StartingCard face Imageview

    • placing

      public void placing(List<Integer> myHand, List<SmallCard> myGrid)
      This method is called by the GUI manager through override when the Client has the right to place a card on the grid. It enables the placing functions on the handDeck
      Overrides:
      placing in class GeneralController
      Parameters:
      myHand - is a reference to a List containing the card IDs of the Client handDeck
      myGrid - is a reference to a List containing the cards in the Client cardGrid

    • positivePlacing

      public void positivePlacing()
      This method is called by the GUI manager through override when the Client placing has got a positive feedback by the server. Then, it proceeds to enable the draw function for the CommonBoard
      Overrides:
      positivePlacing in class GeneralController

    • negativePlacing

      public void negativePlacing()
      This method is called by the GUI manager through override when the Client placing has got a negative feedback by the server. Then, it proceeds to enable again the placing feature from the Client handDeck
      Overrides:
      negativePlacing in class GeneralController

      Overrides:

      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname of the player that is active in the current turn

    • passivePlacingResult

      public void passivePlacingResult(String nickname)
      This method is called by the GUI manager through override when another player has placed a card. Then, it proceeds to refresh the score of everyone on the scoreboard to check differences
      Overrides:
      passivePlacingResult in class GeneralController
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname of the player that is active in the current turn

    • positiveDraw

      public void positiveDraw(List<Integer> resource, List<Integer> golden, List<Integer> aim)
      This method is called by the GUI manager through override when a draw has given a positive feedback from the server. Then, it proceeds to refresh the CommonBoard and the handDeck
      Overrides:
      positiveDraw in class GeneralController
      Parameters:
      resource - is the reference to a List containing the resource deck and plate cards IDs
      golden - is the reference to a List containing the golden deck and plate cards IDs
      aim - is the reference to a List containing the aim deck and plate cards IDs

      Overrides:

      golden - is the reference to a List containing the golden deck and plate cards IDs

    • negativeDraw

      public void negativeDraw()
      This method is called by the GUI manager through override when a draw has given a negative feedback from the server. Then, it proceeds to enable again the CommonBoard draw feature in the Cards ImageView
      Overrides:
      negativeDraw in class GeneralController

    • lastRounds

      public void lastRounds(String nickname)
      This method is called by the GUI manager through override when the lastRounds condition is triggered. It proceeds to show a special label on the screen as a marker of the event
      Overrides:
      lastRounds in class GeneralController
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the name of the client that triggered the lastRounds condition

    • endGame

      public void endGame(List<String> winners) throws IOException
      This method is called by the GUI manager through override when the endgame is reached, so the lastRounds ended. It proceeds to switch scene and announce the winners
      Overrides:
      endGame in class GeneralController
      Parameters:
      winners - is a reference to the List containing the names of the winners
      Throws:
      IOException - in case the endgame.fxml is not correctly loaded

    • updateScoreBoard

      public void updateScoreBoard(String nickname)
      This method updates the ScoreBoard by moving the Tokens in the correct place linked to one Player's score
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname of the player that triggered the update
